title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1352/94 of 13 June 1994 laying down definitive measures on the issuing of STM licences for beef and veal in trade with Spain
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1352/94 of 13 June 1994 laying down definitive measures on the issuing of STM licences for beef and veal in trade with Spain
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Further applications for STM licences may be lodged from 15 June 1994.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 June 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 113, 7. 5. 1993, p. 10.
(2) OJ No L 107, 28. 4. 1994, p. 27.
(3) OJ No L 113, 4. 5. 1994, p. 10.
